Name: 四色跳跃/Four color jump
About the game: Introduction to game playing methods Players need to move the small ball in the operation screen through the left and right keys to make the small ball rise, pass through or contact the springboard and jump up constantly. In addition to the default white, the springboard has four colors. Each time you pass an obstacle, you will change the color. When you encounter the springboard with the same color as the ball, the jump range will be higher than usual~ Gold coins settled after passing the level can unlock skin and other rewards! Operation guide A, D or ←→ key to control the movement of the small ball
